Package com.alticelabs.ccp.exagon.api.protocol_mapper

Interface IExagonProtocolMapperOutbound

public interface IExagonProtocolMapperOutbound
A specification for classes that represent an Exagon protocol mapper for outbound flows in the system.

Its methods are called internally by Exagon. However, for this to happen, the protocol mapper has to be registered through a IExagon.registerExternalServer.

Since:
5.0
See Also:
  • IExagon.registerExternalServer(ExagonProtocolEnum, StackConfiguration, IExagonProtocolMapperOutbound)

      StackEvent convertInternalRequest(Object internalRequest) throws BusinessException
      Converts an outgoing internalRequest into an external request. This request is originated on the business logic and sent to the network through a IExagonExternalServer.
